page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: We interviewed one member from each of two Puddletown families.The aim was to find out how local families spend their time in the area{. { Mrs.Mitchell}is our school secretary. She has a husband (now retired) and three daughters who have left school in recent years.Up until last summer she was busy taking her daughters to athletics meetings around the country.She and her husband spend much time in their garden.she use the local shops and library regularly. With her daughters now away from home she has plans to move to a smaller home in the near future. As far as changes are concerned she would like to see more "starter homes" built,as well as a by-pass and more light industry. she and her family love Puddletown and would not like to move away.
